source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select max([Last_m]) as Last_m
from tbluser

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select * from tbluser Where Last_m <= '@{activity('Lookup max date').output.firstRow.Last_m}' And   Last_m >  '@{activity('Lookup last mod').output.firstRow.LastLoadDate}';
